html:
374 U.S. 107

83 S.Ct. 1689

10 L.Ed.2d 1028

Donald Allen BENTLEY
v.
ALASKA.

No. 648, Misc.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 10, 1963

Donald Allen Bentley, pro se.

George N. Hayes, Atty. Gen. of Alaska, and John K. Brubaker, Asst. Atty. Gen., for respondent.

On Petition for Writ of Certiorari to the Supreme Court of Alaska.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for writ of certiorari are granted. The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the Supreme Court of Alaska for reconsideration in light of Brady v. Maryland, 373 U.S. 83, 83 S.Ct. 1194, and Mooney v. Holohan, 294 U.S. 103, 55 S.Ct. 340, 79 L.Ed. 791.
